name: Nightmares (itch) (SelZ)
description:
Nightmares is a easy Survival Shooter  from Unity Learn.

I did this project during the Videogame Programming course with Unity and I present it here to show the concepts learned through its realization;

  • Camera follow
  • Raycast system
  • Post Processing
  • Interface: victory / defeat panels, transition between scenes, score system, life / death of characters.
  • SpawnPoints of enemies
  • Audio Mixer.
  • Attack system: Shooter and impact.

Assets from Unity Learn.
